original_text: A young man may be very poor. But if he is wise, he is better than a king who is foolish. When the king is old, he may not listen to his friends' advice. A young man may be very poor. But if he is wise, he is better than a king who is foolish. When the king is old, he may not listen to his friends' advice. A young man may be very poor. But if he is wise, he is better than a king who is foolish. When the king is old, he may not listen to his friends' advice. A young man may be very poor. But if he is wise, he is better than a king who is foolish. When the king is old, he may not listen to his friends' advice. A young man may be very poor. But if he is wise, he is better than a king who is foolish. When the king is old, he may not listen to his friends' advice.
korean_text: 가난하여도 지혜로운 젊은이가 늙고 둔하여 경고를 더 받을 줄 모르는 왕보다 나으니

sentences.original_text: A young man may be very poor.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 청년은 매우 가난할 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: But if he is wise,
he is better than a king who is foolish.
When the king is old,
he may not listen to his friends' advice.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 친구들의 조언을 듣지 않을 수 있다.
